item.name: Sakibou-chan

item.fact: It took Kawa months to notice it used to be a swimmer, even though he worked on this sprite himself.

item.name: Baro

item.fact: Baro's better than we expected. Hatstand work.

item.name: Bouche

item.fact: Why do people keep thinking he's drooling toothpaste?

item.name: Jackie-chan

item.fact: She normally wears much more colorful clothes but there's a 16-color limit.

item.name: Kyoufu Kawa
item.author: Kyoufu Kawa
item.fact: There are three distinct Gary images in the game. Kawa wonders why.

item.name: Markus
item.author: Kyoufu Kawa
item.fact: Made after Ailure noticed Markus' old avatar seemed younger than Bouche's, even though Markus is older.

item.name: PokeManiac
item.author: Kyoufu Kawa
item.fact: When Kawa ports a sprite to Pokemon Advance, they get slightly taller due to 8 extra pixels (56 to 64)
